website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty steel slate frame backed by a 5-year warranty and built to last.
pros: We love that it comes with added features that prevent scratching of floors
An instant upgrade for those who've held onto old furniture and want a new frame
cons: Some experience discomfort with solely using foam mattresses

customer_reviews.title: Great Bedframe (Especially if your bigger)
customer_reviews.text: ng product!!! I am a larger guy both tall and hunky. Didn't want to build a bed frame like I had in past. This rescued me. I am 6'3. 420. Lady half is 5'7 230. Bed is sturdy as hell. No shift. No creek. Put together super fast. Is well made. Also able to connect "stuff" if your so inclined. Plus has ability to add headboard. Hope they are around for awhile!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just, wow! This thing is a tank. Me and my wife are "big boned"....we fat...all there is to it. This thing doesn't sway, budge, squeek, bow, or nothing. The last frame I had, I had to build. We are a total of over 600 pounds, and this thing is a champ. EASY to put together. Looks god. And our headboard bolted right up ( had to buy some longer bolts...oh well...11 bucks). I would give this 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This bed seemed really sturdy at first but this evening--2 months after recieving this bedframe--the central bar broke clean off and now the bed is collapsing. I'm a 135 pound person, and i was sitting down to fold laundry--nothing too athletic--when it broke. Unfortunately this happened after the return window (a mere month after the purchase). Judging by the other reviews, i may have been delivered a lemon. EDIT great customer service--called me, apologized, and are sending a new one! Will edit again once i recieve the next bed. UPDATE they sent me an excellent replacement--a little nicer than the last because it has extra support on the middle bar. Wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Papesh

customer_reviews.title: not a sturdy or well built product
customer_reviews.text: I had this "sturdy" frame for about 6 months and then slats just broke. One of the welds broke and the support slat snapped right off. this is crap product i do not recommend it at all
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel R Ude

customer_reviews.title: Very loud squeaking after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame feels strong and supports my Tuft and Needle foam mattress well. Problem is it squeaks SO loudly. It's so loud it wakes me or my wife up whenever we turn over in bed. Update: Now my 25 lb 3 year old makes this bed squeak LOUD simply by getting on it. No jump, just crawling on it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not long after the 30 day return window ended, ...
customer_reviews.text: Not long after the 30 day return window ended, the very middle leg broke of this frame. Was a rude awakening! (Pun intended.)
customer_reviews.author: JDepot

customer_reviews.title: Thought this bed frame was going to be great when we first put it together
customer_reviews.text: Thought this bed frame was going to be great when we first put it together. Now we are 3 weeks in and it is falling down every other day, regardless of what we do. The slats will not stay in and the outer portion of the bed frame is constantly moving out of alignment, causing the slats to fall and therefore for the frame to have no support. Of course, the return window has closed, so now I am stuck with a $100 plus bed frame that does not work at all. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and works well with box spring and ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works well with box spring and mattress. We like a high bed. Our new headboard installed easily to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid, Sturdy, and QUIET! BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several bed frames before making this purchase. I am a big guy, at 6' 0" 340 lbs. I had to have something sturdy. I chose this frame because of its solid construction. The frame arrived on time and well packaged. No dents, scratches, or missing parts. Assembly was an absolute breeze. I worked alone and had it together in 15 minutes tops. The bed is rock solid and stable. It makes NO noise. It fit my Signature Sleep 12" Memory Foam Mattress perfectly. With the recessed mattress frame, the mattress does not slide at all. The 14" frame height is perfect with the 12" mattress. I am absolutely thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TC Holstead

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frame for my guest room and I was very amazed by the quality of this frame! There is practically nothing to assemble and very easy fold and put it away if you require more space. I was very skeptical because there was no review and the price being so cheap, but after looking up their other items (that this company sells), it seemed reliable to give this a try! Very worth the value, and worth the investment. I look forward to try their other products as well! (also the fast shipping) Bottom Line: Sturdy, easy to assemble and put away, and best of all the price is amazing for the quality! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Brant

customer_reviews.title: NOT the right size for queen beds!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my guest bedroom. Wish I would have bought a cheaper one because the size is off. It was easy to put together but, it is isn't true to size, my queen headboard will not attach to it because it's about 1 inch off on each side. Also, the mattress doesn't fit on it and there is at least 3 inches at the bottom or top - so someone is going to hit their knees/legs or pillows will fall. Super frustrating because it's not something you can easily pack up and return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was a breeze, the box is not terribly heavy so if you need to bring it up a flight of stairs it shouldn’t be too bad. The negative part of the review is that the bed frame squeaks during happy time. If you’re just laying on it & move around a little it’s as quiet as a mouse, I guess repetitive movements is what makes the bed squeak. Overall not a horrible purchase but the squeak is annoying. Only have had it for about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: hector baez

customer_reviews.title: Broken on Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: One of the slots is dented and I can't put the bed together. Very disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Reinert

customer_reviews.title: I took it out for good. I am afraid it is going to kill ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this bed is the slats constantly falls. I had to take it out today and retire it, I was not able to use it a year, After it fell for the hundred times, I took it out for good. I am afraid it is going to kill my Cats, who love sleeping under the bed. I had a dinner tray, I kept under my bed made of hard plastic, it shatters it last night all of the slats fell again. If you buy this bed, make sure to weld the slats on, otherwise, it would be a great bed. it is heavy duty, but it does not matter if the rest of the bed is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: carol Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged on arrival, but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love how tall this bed frame is, so there's plenty of storage underneath which is perfect when you live in a small apartment like me. And I love how I don't need a box spring, the mattress goes on perfectly but itself which saved me an extra $100+. And because the frame is so tall, it's the perfect hight for just the frame and mattress.The only bummer is many of the pieces were dented or chipped upon opening the package. It all still works and is great, but it was a little disappointing to get a product that wasn't in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: No sagging! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several king sized beds in our lifetime, but all of them have sagged, and/or broke in the middle because of the shear size and weight. But not this one! I wanted to wait and give a REAL review... so it's been 2 years this month since we've bought it and we've had no issues at all! It does not squeak. It is super sturdy and has had no sagging or anything. It was super simple to put together and its been a dream since. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to to assemble. Very sturdy. Because of my mattress type, (just a memory foam mattress topper actually, because I like the minimum of squish and especially the super portability) I put a sheet of plywood down over the slats. In addition, it's going to be a breeze to take apart and move when necessary and that's part of what I was looking for. I can fold up my "mattress" and bed frame and carry it out the door with out help in just a few minutes. It's part of my plan to be able to fit all my possessions in the back of a pickup, and maximize storage, it's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together, esp once the wife came in and read the directions for me. I put a memory foam bed on it and it looks OK. Slept on it for one night and I'm alive today to write this, so one extra star for that. The 14-inch height is perfect. Wife already started moving her junk under the bed. Haven't tried out more strenuous activities on the bed yet, so I'll be back to comment and take off stars if I run into any problems.....with the bed, not the activities.
customer_reviews.author: knocks

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for us heavy folks
customer_reviews.text: Buy This! Easy to put together. I was looking for something heavy duty. Both of us are "fluffy" and need a strong bed. This fit the bill. Added a 13 inch mattress in a box and headboard from Amazon and we are set. Looks very nice. One caution, those iron legs hurt the toes in the middle of the night. If it keeps happening I am going to wrap them in pipe insulation. Lol but that is my fault. Great bed. Especially if you are fat and need to not worry about collapsing a bed, to be blunt. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to assemble, lots of storage room underneath
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in a spare room, intending to also get a new mattress since the mattress/box spring set I had was so uncomfortable. Because this frame is so sturdy and offers so much support, once I put the old mattress on it was amazingly comfortable (I pitched the box spring since it was in poor shape)! And it has so much room for storage underneath because of it's height. Also easy to assemble and I expect will be easy to take down as needed. Arrived early!
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Frame was damaged, bent & heavily scratched, pics included. Shipping material does not seem suitable for package. Frame puts together easily however tools provided are weak and bend.
customer_reviews.author: Gyp Rosetti

customer_reviews.title: Unable to Assemble- Wrong Parts
customer_reviews.text: After getting halfway through the assembly process, we realized that the middle support piece was 2” higher than the rest of the pieces and would not work with the 14” bed frame. So we had to repackage everything and return it. Keep in mind that this is a very heavy item with many pieces to fit back into the box like a Tetris puzzle- not the easiest item to return, but we made it work. Will be ordering a replacement frame from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: MTshopper

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Well. It broke. For whatever reason, the bars going across the bed are too short on one side and keep slipping down. We won't even be on the bed and we'll hear a big CLINK of the bar falling down on the floor. It's been too much of a hassle to deal with taking the mattress off, jerry-rigging a fix, then putting everything back together just to have it break again. I should have invested in a better quality frame that would last be longer. The minute I move out of my apartment, this bedframe is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Evie C

customer_reviews.title: Here's the truth about this bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of negative reviews saying this bed frame wobbles or squeaks. Not true. I bought one and seeking to avoid such issues I tightened the provided screws very tightly while I assembled it. No wobbles, no squeaks. It's strong and stable. Holds my mattress comfortably without a box spring. The assembly process is very simple and the instructions clear if you pay close attention to the images. One word of caution... the supports on the middle of each side are toe crunchers. You'll learn quickly to avoid stubbing your toes on them. In short, I love this bed frame. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Strudy Very Come
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I was worried i would have to put it all together but it's totally assembled in the box u just take it out and unfold it. It's not heavy, i set it up myself in like 10 seconds. It's completely silent. I hate when u get out of bed and it makes that squeaky creaking noise cuz it wakes up my dog but this is dead quiet. Im very very happy with it. I put a hybrid twin mattress on it and it's very sturdy very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leah T.

customer_reviews.title: Not great but not horrible
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 5 stars but is does need some improvements. It is truly easy to assemble; probably the easiest I’ve ever had to assemble. It has ample room for storage underneath. The downside for me are the top horizontal supports, they pop out. Also, I like to sit up in bed and when I do this, the top of the mattress slides down between the slates. Super frustrating. I’ve had to purchase a box spring to make this stop happening; the whole reason I bought this was to avoid the box spring. But overall it’s decent. I think it would make a better guest room bed then an everyday bed
customer_reviews.author: JMartin

customer_reviews.title: Extended Review
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to start my new sleeping on my newest package. Fast forward several weeks later, I notice that one of the legs look lopsided and uneven to the others. **UPDATE**SEPTEMBER 30TH👉🏾 Update on my previous review. I notice a few imperfections in the thin rods on the frame. Some of them appear bent. Also my mattress bottom appears wrinkled and I do not know whether or not it is damaged. I would suggest to the distributor and Creator of this bed frame to include a sturdy bottom support or plywood like material to "sandwich" between the frame and mattress to avoid other harm to the consumer's matress.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: Storage, sturdiness, and height in an awesome bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of these in the last 3 weeks. Full and King. You need to realize the amount of space this frame leaves under your bed. Daughter loves it for storing her shoes boxes underneath and clearing closet space. My needs are not for storage but I'm 6'3" and finally enjoy proper height for my bed. Assembly is a cinch. Extremely sturdy. I'd recommend to anyone. If open space under bed bothers you you'll need a bed skirt. Again there is ALOT of open area under my king bed now.
customer_reviews.author: Andy miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a spare room
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the guest room because a normal box spring/bed frame wouldn’t fit up the stairs. It was pretty heavy, but very easy to assemble. I like that it came as two pieces. I only needed help assembling it because we have it set up in a small room and I didn’t want to hit the walls or TV by mistake, but I’m sure this could be put together by one person. I deducted a star because the mattress doesn’t sit completely flat. It’s a little bumpy... you can’t see it once you put pillows and blankets on... but you can feel it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to my mattresses and bed frames but this was a winner I ordered it in the king size just yesterday as well the current one I have is the queen size and my mom loves it so much and my bed so much that I’m giving it to her to get the size of bed that I really need otherwise I would’ve kept onto this probably for my entire lifetime I highly recommend this product the price is right it’s sturdy I weigh 250 pounds and my boyfriend weighs 380 pounds and there was no issue with the holding us up
customer_reviews.author: Shelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: My brother put this together for me. It is able to hold so much underneath, so far I have 3 shoe bags, 2 paint bags, 2 large storage bins. They all fit with plenty of extra space. One complaint, the holder bars in the middle have a tendency to pop out every now and then toward the end. Not too serious, but it's due to the design. I have the 13inch Olee mattress to go with this frame, it sticks out a little. The corners are a little sharp and hurt if you hit your foot on it. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shakeera

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, but weak fasteners!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it but the fasteners are cheap metal almost impossible not to strip them, and when fighting them if you tighten them the required amount for it to be stable it deforms them guaranteed, I found myself banging my Allen keys with tools to loosen then each time I reccomend that before assembly replace all fasteners with ones of good quality to avoid a hassle when deassembling, also have you own tools ready because the ones that come with the kit are really uncomfortable to use and I doubt you could really tighten then unless you have extremely strong hands . The diagram was very clear and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro perez

customer_reviews.title: Much better off on the floor
customer_reviews.text: This held up for about 2 nights of sleeping and intimate time before it caved. The slats are too far apart to be supportive, you'll need a box spring with this unit... And also don't expect to get a little bow chicha wow wow in, cause this bedframe won't stand for it--literally. Like it caved in and I have brusies on both lower legs, beneath my knees. I really thought this would last us a year, but it hardly made it a week. Definitely returning in the morning... maybe we'll just sleep in the floor tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: First of all, one of the holes for the screws to go in was half covered with extra metal and I had to use a tool to bend it and shave it down enough to get the screw to even be able to fit in the hole at all. Secondly, I bought this less than 6 months ago, and it completely collapsed and it is not possible to put back together as the pieces are warped. So angry. Loved my queen size one, king size one is awful. Now I'm sleeping on a mattress on the floor and who knows when I'll be able to afford another bed frame. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: D Corz

customer_reviews.title: So Happy with this Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Sets up just as easily as the company claims. With the recessed legs on this I was able to use my same bed frame, minus the slats (most of which were broken or would not stay in). I threw away my box springs that had become past repair. I actually could have skipped ordering a mattress that was ordered the same day; but, has not arrived yet. I just hope to be pleased with that too. Also, the bonus travel pillow you get with this purchase is nice.
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: The Best Frame
customer_reviews.text: I have luxury vinyl flooring and this frame does not move at all, so I’m confident it won’t cause scratching over time. I got the king size and I put it together by myself without a problem. The directions were easy to follow, all the pieces were present, and I didn’t need any additional tools. *When you are assembling it and it’s time to stretch out parts C and D, I did need to step on one end of the part to get it open, but that was the only challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Positively Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just gonna come out and say it, I'm fat. My wife is fat. We needed a bed that would support "bigger" people, and this fits the bill. I was a little worried at first, but once I began assembling, the quality and sturdiness began to shine through. It all went together quickly and with minimal adult vocabulary use. Once together, it really feels like you could park a riding lawnmower on it and it wouldn't budge. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Simple bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Although it was very easy to put together, there really isn't anything preventing the mattress from sliding around. It also doesn't connect to a head board like most frames. We will probably have to use zip ties if we want it attached.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cox

customer_reviews.title: An amazing and sturdy frame! Dont be afraid to buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bed frame. Dont worry about purchasing it, go right ahead. My partner and I were able to put it together (king size) within 10 minutes since the assembly is so easy. Its VERY sturdy. My partner is about 6'7 300 pounds and im 5'9 190, and we could jump on the thing and it will hold. We did hear some slight squeeking during our "activities" but havnt anymore as we feel the frame has fully adjusted. Im so glad we bought this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Annamaria

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, too wide for the headboard though.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by how easy it was to assemble. There’s lots of storage space underneath, though I will most likely need a bed skirt. The only issue I have with the frame is that it was too wide for my headboard, so the holes for the bolts did not match up. I’m currently looking for a fix for this but in the meantime, some black zip ties have been holding the 2 together. I would’ve given this a 5 star except that it didn’t match up with my headboard. Still would recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Toner

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I’m so happy with my purchase, it’s just the right height and so easy to assemble, also shipping was extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: Sloping mattress issue
customer_reviews.text: We are huge fans of the box spring-less bed frames and have them in 5 of the 6 bedrooms of our home. This was my first time venturing away from the brand we always tend to favor. The look and overall quality is great however on both the top and bottom end of the frame, the mattress tends to tuck in between the edge of the frame and the last slat. This makes the mattress slope at the top and bottom of the bed. It can easily be pulled out but after a nights sleep, it slides right back under and the bottom edge of the 13 inch mattress is trapped again. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I sleep in a cloud now
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bed. We’re both large people and this sturdy bed is just what we needed. We had planned to replace the mattress, but I think that can wait now. A couple things, it takes a little time, but it’s fairly easy to assemble. We were not able to attach our headboard but there are notches to do so on the frame. If you have a box spring, you will be high in the air. That’s our only issue. The frame is very high, and add our mattress and box spring and we’re now several feet off the ground. We’re getting adjusted to climbing into the bed (literally). But we will deal!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Helped bring back support to my mattress
customer_reviews.text: The $100 support bed rails, with plastic cones to support the rails, I got when I bought the bed 5 years ago, were breaking apart ultimately not providing my box spring the support it needed. I got the queen size Olee Platform support and was amazed at the easiness of putting it together and the excellent support it gave back to my mattress and I got to eliminate the box spring altogether! I have been sleeping on it for a week and already feel a difference in my body (no aches) and seem more restful. Thank you for this product and for the free travel pillow I just rec'd.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gardina

customer_reviews.title: If your mattress sinks through, it’s your mattress not the product!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to assemble, all tools included and seems sturdy. No squeaking also I tested the frame with a “tuft n needle” mattress no box spring no plywood for extra support and I’m 215 lbs and my mattress didn’t sink into the spaces between the slats when I laid on it so maybe those who are complaining of this have poor quality mattresses? Mine did fine pics included (photos are from under bed while I’m laying on it) I will update my review after breaking it in some, as of now my only concern is the metal seems pretty light weight I feel like it might bend or snap so far so good though
customer_reviews.author: StefInThe360

customer_reviews.title: Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed frame for my husband's bed. It arrived on time, in great condition, and was very easy to put together. The frame is light weight and sturdy in addition to being easy to move. I give it three stars because the top of the frame does not have any lip on it to keep the mattress in place. The mattress can slide off the frame easily. If there was an indentation the mattress rested down into or a bar at the foot of the bed to hold the mattress, it would be a great frame.
customer_reviews.author: CrisMar1

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, feels sturdy & also a good price. It took about 20 minutes for 2 of us to put together, the directions are vague & the pieces arent marked as A, B, etc., even though the directions outline them that way, it could have been faster if they were labeled. Mine came in a damaged box so I was slightly concerned about scratches & there were none. But even if there were, it's an inexpensive bed frame & nobody is really going to see it. 4 stars because some of the slat bars didn't snap in as tightly as the others & the vague directions
customer_reviews.author: LexiRave

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be so that a box spring is not required. But if you don’t buy a box spring the mattress sinks down between the slat and is extremely uncomfortable. I had to buy a box spring which cost me an additional $200 that I didn’t plan to spend. With the cost of this and the box spring I could have had a much higher quality frame. I bought the zinus bed frame that folds in the past and was so impressed with the quality and ease to put together that I assumed this would be the same. I couldn’t be more wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Meador

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're overweight
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy person and wanted a durable bed frame for myself and my boyfriend. I ordered a queen size frame. It was rather easy to assemble. No squeaks. Very sturdy and solid. It does stick out more than the matress, but if your blanlets hang off the sides, you wont notice. I read reviews of people stubbing toes and had got pool noodles to wrap around the legs. I bought one, but have not put it on the legs yet, so far I have not stubbed any toes though. Overall, I am pleased with the frame quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: lace42282

customer_reviews.title: Sooo happy I got this :D
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting this together. The box was pretty heavy, how ever that is to be expected. I put it together by myself! It didn’t take long (maybe 30 minutes with hand tools) and all of the holes lined up perfectly. The directions are easy to follow and everything is labeled clearly. There is space underneath where you can slide things like suitcases! I have a memory foam mattress and I was concerned this frame wouldn’t work well for Me. However it works perfectly! I got this because it seems very sturdy and hopefully will be able to handle itself well. I feel like it is going to be a perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Arguello

customer_reviews.title: Rewrite of original review.
customer_reviews.text: The construction is excellent and customer building it simple. The design is well thought out. I have adhesive furnature sliders that allow for easy movement of a heavy frame and mattress. Having the storage space underneath makes it far more practical than conventional frame, box spring, and mattress. If not for my size limitation it would be near perfect. Value, construction, usefulness. My stars are increased because I was irresponsible in not reading the frame has a lip that prevents sliding. If you have severe space limitations be sure to use the clearly stated measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Persop

customer_reviews.title: Noise free. Wiggle free.
customer_reviews.text: Bedframe came well packaged and in good condition. It's ridiculously easy to assemble. It took me 30 minutes from opening the box to putting it all away. The bedframe seems sturdy but it doesn't feel like it. I saw another customer add middle support beems with wood and now my mattress and frame feel well supported. It does have brackets to mount a headboard and they are wide so you can slide the board into place or to accommodate boards that are slightly wider or vice versa. Very pleased with this purchase. It doesn't squeek of make noise when you get on the mattress. No wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: djmaximus

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Frame was easy to put together and seems sturdy. It is for the guest bed room so it doesn't get nightly use but has held together fine the past couple of months. The mattress sits down in the frame, which on one hand is good, no slipping, but it makes it hard to tuck the sheets under when making the bed (we don't have box spring) sheets also can hang down when you tuck them under because there are only bars. Also the middle legs on the side are hell on toes in the night. Overall seems good, a satisfactory guest room bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kee14

customer_reviews.title: Very very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice and affordable bed frame! Just purchased a few days ago 2nd night on it so far and has kept up real nice. I myself am 6'1 300lbs and have two dogs combined weight at around 190lbs. Very very sturdy. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a heavy duty, easy to assemble metal bed frame!!! One thing I mite add is I would recommend buying a couple sheets of plywood to place on bertram them put the mattress ontop of plywood. I say this because the metal ribs on the frame sink into the bottom of the bed. Easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Mike207rider

customer_reviews.title: Functional and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Bed frame is very easy to assemble and I did it all myself. Love the extra storage under the frame. Also it supports mattress very well without box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and No box spring needed
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed frame in order to provide a lower bed for my elderly dad to get in and out of, the bed he had with box spring made the bed very high and difficult to get in and out of. This provides the low profile we need plus it’s sturdy enough to not need a box spring. It doesn’t squeak and move like some metal bed frames on wheels the require a box string so we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is EVERYTHING!! I love this platform bed. It is sturdy, takes up less room, has alot of space under it for little totes or baskets if you need extra storage. No creaking noises (& I'm a pleasantly plump girl. Lol), mattress does not slide off it, & it is the perfect height. The only thing about the bed was it wasn't as easy to put together as I thought it would be, but once we got the hang of it, it went quicker. I definitely recommend this bed. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amy l.

customer_reviews.title: Withstood only a year
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted.... after one year, the steel frame gave way. The welding on the corner supports are not durable. The bed collapsed. This is coming from a couple that has a COMBINED weight of less than 300 pounds. Not durable if you are an "active" couple...
customer_reviews.author: Amber Adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly sturdy,easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived well packaged. Frame is easy to assemble. Highly recommend a #5 metric hex socket and ratchet to speed up assembly. This thing is amazingly strong when assembled. One suggestion: Get yourself a couple 4’ length pieces of 2” foam pipe insulation to cover the vertical supports (12” each), your toes will appreciate it when you make the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Catman

customer_reviews.title: Slats fall out
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble, but the slats at each end of the bed fall out easily if you sit on the corners or end of the bed, then you find yourself falling through the frame. Painful surprise. We have a 10 inch Ashley Chime mattress on the bed, which can be placed directly on this type of frame. Yes, we did follow directions, and placed the correct slats in the middle of the frame. This is a real safety problem. After this happened too many times I resorted to duct-taping the slats to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holes drilled askew for one cross bar
customer_reviews.text: askew holes on one crossbar not terrible, but isn't it assembled on a JIG which holds all pieces in place as they are welded/drilled/tapped for the screw thread size? Most reviews are overrated on this product, I wanted to bring it in line a bit. Also some cross bars were slightly short/long and had to be forced or they easily popped out.Overall, I would say 4-5 stars for the end result, after I used electric tape to wrap most of the joints to allow a more snug fit on the pieces. All hardware is present with extras provided and it was well packed. You WILL like the increased storage space under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied CustomerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Great manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: I'd buy anything from this company. Holes were where they're supposed to be and everything fit right. My only complaint is with the nut wrench they give you. The prongs bend out I'd like to see an executive of this company assemble this bed with that wrench. I had to use small Channelocks to hold the nut. If you have a metric and SAE combination wrench set or a good pair of pliers you should be alright. They admonish you to make sure everything is TIGHT yet with the first nut the wrench gives way.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Koski

customer_reviews.title: Second one I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. I bought a full size one a couple of years ago and it is great so I just recently purchased the queen for my other son's room. Sturdy, looks great, can attach a headboard (we did), easy to put together. Waited for WEEKS for the queen size to go back in stock and it finally did! Highly recommend this sturdy, heavy weight bed frame. When you are buying one like this, make sure you can attach a headboard if needed. Many do not have that feature.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMom

customer_reviews.title: Assembled all by myself
customer_reviews.text: Came with the necessary tools. Instructions were easy to follow. Even though I gave it five stars there were a few negative things to comment about. Assembly: you will need a mallet to bang the slats in place. Once assembled everything fit square and tight. It is just that the instructions don't mention the missing tool. Packing: the zip tie holding the pieces together broke allowing the pieces inside to bang against each other destroying the packing box. Luckily nothing was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Moonbeam

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to order TWO QUEENS, one for each kid!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to upsize for space & confort. VERY STURDY KING FRAME! Easy to assemble with included tool. Hubby can roll all night and I won't feel it. Our dog loves the space available for him to roll around on. Paired with Purple Hybrid mattress and barely any back pain in the morning. Put 1.5 sheets of sheetrock(wrapped edge w/duct tape) on bars to distribute load. Can even store my suitcase underneath. Did make one adjustment. Bought wrap around foam pipe insulation and wrapped posts to save toes and feet. Worked GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I have had these type of bed frames that last 5 years or more and all of them were of these narrow "wire" type inner designs and this one is heavy and very easy to assemble, I was very surprised. I am hoping this is the last frame I have to buy because the wire design ones don't hold up at all. if you have to stand on the bed, or fall on the bed or maybe wrestle with the wife the wire type frames bend the wires and then they eventually sink in in spots. This is the only type to get.... Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dave Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I are big people, easily over 500lbs together. It holds up to both of us perfectly. Every frame we have purchased over the years has eventually broke. While we haven't had it long it has already beat all other frames we've ever had. It barely makes a noise during adult fun (possibly from settling). No need for box springs. Good level from the floor without them. Lots of space underneath for storage. Our 3 dogs can fix under without an issue as before only the smallest one could. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: The frame is Very sturdy metal. Have used for regular mattress and foam mattress and works well for both. Two complaints would the following: 1. The bars come out easily if bumped (my girls like to crawl under the bed as there is a ton of space) or if bed is moved. 2. the frame is actually too long for our mattresses, which are of normal length. We have queen beds so ordered the queen size frame and it sticks out about 3 inches (either head or foot depending on where you prefer) so banging our legs on it is common. Overall good for the price but can’t expect excellence.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame to replace an Ikea bed that made so much noise it drove me crazy. I thought I'd be able to attach my existing headboard or foot board, but it doesn't line up right (Hemnes bed). I leaned the headboard against the wall and was able to use some zip ties to hold the foot board on. Once covid crisis is over I will head to hardware store for a better solution. The bed is sturdy and doesn't make any noise when there's movement. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TLW

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble, so far does not squeak
customer_reviews.text: i like this bed frame, it has a great price. i ordered the full size thinking i had a full sized bed...i measured my bed and it is a full, but the frame is a bit smaller than the mattress. i don't know if it's meant to be like that but it's not a big deal. i like that you can't see the corners of the frame and therefore you cant hurt yourself on them because they are pretty hard. overall i like the height and the fact that it makes almost zero noise, i haven't heard a squeak and i hope it stays that way. (mattress brand: purple, so heavy)
customer_reviews.author: adriana salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this inexpensive, sturdy, easy to assemble bed frame EXCEPT because all the support bars go the width of the bed and none go the length my mattress is pushing through the spaces. My mattress is thinner than most and I got it that way because I like Extra Firm support but its not working with this style frame. The more heavily used areas of mattress are pushing through the frame. I am going to try to fix it by tying several lengths of wire across the frame. I could probably use plywood as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp corners, wiggly slats and base larger than mattress
customer_reviews.text: The base is larger than the mattress size, thus the mattress does not fit well and continuously slides. The edges are the worst! Extra sharp and pointy. I had to add some corner plastic protectors, specially with a toddler running around. I had bumped a lot into it since it’s hard to have a good eye “ measure” once you have the blankets and comforter on. If the return process was easier I’d do it but this is extremely heavy for me to carry into my car by myself. And finally, some of the slats do not fit well so it makes some noises when moving. :( I still find amazing the storage possibilities, but overall not a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: AMcD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase, Worth The Cost!
customer_reviews.text: Original: About 6 months in, no squeaking or issues! A little rough to put together alone, but not impossible. Instructions are clear, and the slats support my mattress without issues. A bit taller than I expected. Update: I now have two of these - the King Size (my original review) and the twin size for my office (pictured). After moved and reorganization, still no squeaking, still sturdy, and still a wonderful purchase for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Regret this purchase. I have a full size bed and bought the full size platform. Either my mattress shrunk, I got a queen size platform in a full size-labeled box, or this company doesn’t know the measurements of a full-size mattress. After putting together, which was pretty easy, I throw the mattress on it. It is about six inches too long and about the same too wide for my mattress. Get on the bed and the mattress goes sliding around. I feel like bending the frame with my bare hands. I’m so pissed!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I won’t lie. It took me about an hour to an hour & 1/2 to assemble. It’s very simple tho I was surprised how easy it was considering I’m not good with building things at all. Would definitely recommend! It is very sturdy ! Unlike other easy to put up bed frames that are also easily broken. Had it up for 2 weeks now and it’s still going strong. Sturdy with no issues. Held multiple people totaling 500lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble and a lot of storage height. I'll need to get a thinner box spring to compensate for the height. Main issues, some squeaking from time to time. Also the package was handled really badly during delivery. Many holes in the box and there wasn't really any padding inside to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Khondker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to go from a five star to a three star review Pro : Bed frame is sturdy and easy to put together. No squeaking or moving . Happy with my purchase . Cons : Needed to have antislip stripes on the railings and could use four more railings to keep the mattress (especially on the corners ) from bending down because it has no support . So one railing on the top and one more railing on the button on each side would be a good idea. I now have to buy plywood and a anti slip padding for the bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Please stay strong!
customer_reviews.text: So got the bed up. Took my husband and I under 15 min. to put together once everything was laid out. He wanted box spring, I didn't. Bed would be too high. Probably will get a bunkie board cause the mattress is sagging between the rails, not blaming on the bed, just thinks that certain mattresses need that support. Love the storage up under the bed. Please stay strong and sturdy. All weight combined (2 adults and mattress) probably a little under 600lbs. Said holds up to 1500lbs. Let's see if you are true to your word. Will update in a couple of months or if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: Kikigreen

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about it. It's easy to assemble and still sturdy 2 years later. Only minor downsides are that the corners are too sharp of an angle for my liking and the claim that it's "squeak-free" hasn't been the case for me. Although, it seldom happens and only in certain areas, angles and movements.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easily Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: The installation was super easy. Unfold the frame, insert the slats. However, I don't recommend using anything thinner than a 12" mattress because the bars are uncomfortable to lay on. Also, I used this frame for my kids and the bars kept sliding out and falling to the floor during the night. It was not just one bar, it was several. They kept slipping out from the frame so either the support bars are too short or something needs to keep them from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: LovesPrime

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for this bed!
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived in perfect condition and my SO had it assembled in less than an hour. I only held a few things together at points but he said it could be put together by one person alone. The tools come in a sealed package with extra screws (which he said was awesome but we didn't end up needing them). We got a king and it has a much smaller footprint than our own bed which I love. Also there is a lot of room under the bed for storage. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: RHPlus Cosplay

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great storage underneath. I was able to put 6 laundry baskets under the bed and still have about half of the space left which is really great for me as I live In a small house. It says it's a 1200lb capacity but I'm a little bit worried because it doesnt seem as heavy duty as it claims. I got it because my partner is 6'8" a pretty big guy plus me so we needed a good frame. It is a bit squeaky as of the 1st night. I will definitely update later if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Sturdy, Simple Bed Frame - UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After sleeping on this frame with a Memory Foam Mattress (12” thickness) the mattress started sinking between the slats 2-3 inches. My back and neck started hurting. I went to the home improvement store and bought 3/4” plywood and cut it to size to fit inside the frame. No more sinking mattress. Feels much more firm. I am reducing my review to 3 stars for the extra expense and hassle. Nice, sturdy, simple bed frame. Holds our full size 12" memory foam mattress with no issues. No sqweeks. The only issues is none of the parts were labeled like the instructions indicated. Not a big deal, but could be frustrating for some people.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to assemble, Tools included, no problems
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness, that tools and easy instructions were included with the nuts and bolts, along with a few extra replacement bolts/nuts. Very quick assembly. No sharp edges. You will need a mallet for the slats on both ends of the bed, but not the middle slats. I put some slider flannel tape on the bottom of the feet to avoid scratches. I placed a bed skirt under my mattress. I Will update in a few months, but so far assembly went without a hitch and my full size memory foam mattress now has a top notch foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Belle8

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, logical and strong design and assembly. Exceptional packaging because the styrofoam pads are contained in sealed plastic bags so those little pieces don’t go everywhere and attach themselves to everything with static electricity. With a bit of ingenious propping on my part, I assembled it myself in less than an hour. As a grandmother in her 70th year, it gave me a lot of pleasure to do so. Fits great. Doesn’t squeak. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Frame and The Noise is Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of our creaky and noisy bed frame. Really took to fun out of sleep and additional bedroom activities. This frame was very easy to put together and appears very sturdy and well made. My only knock on this frame is that I would have liked pre-drilled holes on both ends of the frame for mounting our existing head-board and foot-board. As it stands, I had to drill holes to mount our headboard. Other than that, I have nothing but good things to stay about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Da Bunkster

customer_reviews.title: Queen frame king slats
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say just how sturdy and great everything has been however I never got to sleep on it because it had to be sent back because I was sent two different sizes of the product. I received a queen size frame and king size slats. It was easy to assemble as I got fully done besides the slats being put in and tightened. I asked to be sent queen size slats and I’d return the king size however that wasn’t an option but they did refund my money within like an hour after I returned the product to the UPS store so that was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK solid but tear down will take a while.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid frame that will hold your mattress and two heavy people well. However, it does not fold up like some others and has many slats that will have to be taken out and tied up when it's time to move the frame. Also, the legs sit too far out and will stub and maybe someday break you little toe.
customer_reviews.author: B. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and allows for great storage space
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup (although I did read the instructions and have an easy time figuring out stuff like this). It is very sturdy, modern looking, and allows for great storage under the bed (and my idiot dog who always get stuck under normal beds because he's a little too big can't get stuck under this one). The only thing is you have to train yourself where the legs are so you don't stub your toe because of how sturdy they are it will hurt. Oh and because of how this assembles, it would also be pretty easy to disassemble if you have to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Steen

customer_reviews.title: WOW Who needs a Box Spring now !!
customer_reviews.text: Came in today and set up was a Huge Task {Just Kidding} unfold the legs and use the bolts provided to tie the two frames together Set into place and Add Mattress!! Very well made and Space under is roomy for boxes...this frame is even better than the full-size platform bed we had before ....Which broke due to wood tear-out on the rails Worth the Price and More and considering the current COVID-19 issues Shipping was fast and Super great service from UPS...
customer_reviews.author: L Reese

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a king bed and this is PERFECT! It has perfect storage underneath, however, my cats use it to hide from me and to play more than I have stored anything under it. The only thing I have to say, is for whoever said they put this together in like 30 minutes by themselves is superhuman. It wasn’t hard, just not something I could have done by myself at all. It comes with all the tools you need but I’m just clumsy and couldn’t hold up two pools while I screwed them together. But other than that, it’s a great bed and doesn’t squeak!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic bed frame - it’s somewhat easy to assemble and will accommodate a memory foam mattress easily. My gripe with it is definitely the middle bar - I’ve managed to slam my feet and stub my toes countless times just because it’s in such an inconvenient place when you’re trying to do anything like put sheets on. Other than the design inconvenience, it’s an ok bed frame. I think I’d pick something different in the future.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a bed frame, so let's keep this simple. I used the instructions as a reference to put the bed together, so not that hard ;) Took probably 30 mins or so. It's solid, might get an occasional squeak, but I sometimes wonder if that's the bed frame that's the old spring frame cuz it's older. Seems like there's enough room to push most stuff under the bed, but haven't done that yet to see. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Hellum

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but the legs are way too far out
customer_reviews.text: The legs on this are so far out I have had to tape cut up pool noodles around them, as I've hit my foot/toes on them and because they are so sturdy the foot is the one that gets all the impact. And this is not just me but other family members. They should have designed it so that the legs were inset more. This is one of those things you just don't want to return as it's so heavy and cumbersome. It's a good and sturdy frame just poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Firecracker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! LOW QUALITY, CAN'T ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it, I can't believe it.... This is 21st century and this industrial product can't be manufactured accurately. And this is only a bed frame, not a rocket. The problem is, for the part "E", I can never straighten it to what it should be. The two parts are made too long so they collide with each other and can't get through. Are you kidding me? My mattress will be delivered tomorrow and I have to ask them to lean my mattress on the wall. I packed the bed frame back to the box and will return it tomorrow. It is heavy and hard to pack. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty great
customer_reviews.text: This bed is pretty great, so far. My husband and I are heavier people and this holds us even with "activity" no squeaks, feels sturdy and comfortable. The only thing I was not prepared for was the height. We use this with a box spring and mattress for extra back support and it definitely raises the bed up quite a bit from the floor. My 6'1" husband doesn't mind at all, but for a 5'4" me, it takes some practice getting in.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to assemble and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 6 year old grandchildren helped me to assemble this platform. The best part was how they have played under the bed and used a flashlight to read. They also play hide and seek. I am very pleased with this product, great instructions and excess storage space.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame..did not fit my Sleep Number bed though.
customer_reviews.text: It isn't often that I give a 5 star review to something that I return, but I did in this case. The King frame width is AS ADVERTISED- 75.5" My Sleep Number bed is 76" I made a rookie shopping mistake and read reviews and questions on the product - where someone asked if it fit a Sleep Number, and the person answered with an exuberant "YES!". I didn't check the dissensions before buying. Anyway....the frame was excellent quality, easy to assemble - just a little too narrow for me. I was sad that I had to return it. (I think the seller should correct bogus answers, but I digress).
customer_reviews.author: Chris Paul

customer_reviews.title: OMG What a great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This was SO easy to put together (by myself, btw). I am VERY impressed out how sturdy and durable it is . The mattress fit perfectly on top and the frame has plenty of clearance underneath for storing things. I am very very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Menear

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage underneath
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and we dont hear any creaking. Perfect amount if space for storage underneath. However, some of the slats fit with the attached plastic ends and so we had to pray off. Also, a few slats dudnt reach all the way to the edges of the side bars. If you purchase it you'll see what I meant. It doesnt affect putting the mattress on top because the other slats level it out. It's way better than a traditional frame for a bed though.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy J

product_meta.title: Olee Sleep 14 Inch Heavy Duty Steel Slat/ Anti-slip Support/ Easy Assembly/ Mattress Foundation/ Bed Frame/ Noise Free/ No Box Spring Needed, Full
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Style:BasicThe steel slat bed frame is the perfect solution to fit in small spaces. Ample storage under bed for linens, out-of-season clothing or other items. The solid steel slats and steel frame construction with excellent strength and durability provides more sturdy support to mattress. No box spring needed. No scratch their luxury floor. Hold mattress not to slide on bed frame. Self foldable. Looking chic it can be a perfect solution for your bed room.
feature_bullets: Minimalist Style Allows You to Maximize Space in Your Small Bedroom
Unique Sturdy design - The frame encloses the mattress to prevent slipping and provides ample under-bed space
Easy and seamless assembly – all the required hardware and tools are included
No box spring needed / Headboard compatible
Outer dimensions: 76.5 x 55.5 x 14 inches / Inner dimensions: 74.5 x 53.5 x 13 inches
Contemporary bed with storage – the bed frame offers ample under-bed storage with 13. 5 inches of Clearance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,067 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Minimalist Style Allows You to Maximize Space in Your Small Bedroom
